name: Amnix - 721
metadata:
{"name": "Amnix - 721 1/88", "description": "I believe Music NFTs are all about freedom. Setting the artist free from having to fulfill labelsb� expectations to fit with their catalog. Free from legacy systems. Freedom for artists' expression and a space for artistic experimentation. In the spirit of freedom, Ib�ve decided to do my genesis drop on the 4th of July.

The story behind the creation is about freedom too. I was asked to produce music for the trailer soundtrack of a game. I was given some reference music and I started off with the main element b� the arpeggio. Everything evolved naturally around it. I was in the moment and in the mood for experimenting with synthesis techniques and I took quite a different direction from what they were expecting me to deliver. However, I was happy with the final result and decided to keep this one for myself.

As for the utility of this NFT, as a holder of 1 of the limited edition of 88, youb�ll receive future AirDrops of new NFTs (got a Music NFT collection coming soon) and get on Zoom with me to receive mixing advice and/or composition guidance on your current project. If you arenb�t exactly a producer then we can have a chat about something else. 

The holder of the 1/1 edition will receive all the music stems of this NFT and be able to remix it. You might mint the result if you want. Link: https://zora.co/collections/0x2B5426A5B98a3E366230ebA9f95a24f09Ae4a584/119

Whitelist my address to be able to get future Music NFT AirDrops (got a collection coming soon) and come and say Hi on twitter @Amnix_music ", "image": "ipfs://bafkreigr32foyzowbmeacbnkecvv2ek655dddj743mhi6lves6zqy2rai4?id=1", "animation_url": "ipfs://bafybeifyh34krefsuvx53cr36lqvyd4savc5bhvlszwd5joeiqgzyv6lli?id=1", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Amnix - 721"}}
